title: Rule 13

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player at night to shrink their target pool to three players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each night, submit a player and a list of three other players. They may only target these three players with their abilities. They may not target the same person out of this group more than once. Once they have used their ability on all of these three players, this effect goes away.
- You may include up to one dead player in your target pool. If you do this, you may not include your target in the target pool.
- You have a one-use Basic autovest.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the good faction lose the game.
